titleStmt.title: The. vii. shedynges of the blode of Ihesu cryste
Contemplacyon or medytacyon of the shedynge of the blood of our lorde Jhesu Cryste at seven tymes.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the signe of the sonne, by Wynkyn de Worde,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde god. M.ccccc.ix.] [1509]

notesStmt.note: First known edition (STC 14546) entitled: A contemplacyon or medytacyon of the shedynge of the blood of our lorde Jhesu Cryste at seven tymes.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reels 11 and 81 (both Cambridge University Library copy).
